MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Wincham and Marston, affecting properties in Chapel Street, Hawthorn Walk and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a squirrel on the line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.25am on 29th of April 2021.
